title: Prime Day: Amazon is Not Done Yet, Here Are the 10 Best Deals for This Thursday
description: Amazon aims to capitalize on the Prime Day momentum by continuing to provide great discounts across a wide range of products.
author: Gizmodo Deals
excerpt: Amazon aims to capitalize on the Prime Day momentum by continuing to provide great discounts across a wide range of products.
text: As the dust settles on Amazon’s Prime Day event, you’ll see that the deals aren’t over just yet. While the official event has concluded, a lot of discounts remains for those quick enough to seize them. This year’s October Prime Day, also known as Prime Big Deal Days, proved to be a shopping phenomenon that rivaled the famous Black Friday in terms of savings. Check out the 20 must-see deals of the day that you won’t want to miss below! See all deals at Amazon Our Top 20 deals: Google Nest Wifi : $38 instead of $169 iPad 9 64GB Wifi : $199 instead of $329 NordVPN : $3.09/month + 3 months for free (-73%) WD 20TB external HD : $296 instead of $505 4-pack AirTags : 79$ instead of $99 AirPods Pro 2 : $189 instead of $249 Beats Solo 4 : $99 instead of $199 Pixel 7 Pro 256GB : $447 instead of $999 Lego Star Wars Advent Calendar : $35 instead of $45 Arzopa 15″ portable monitor : $85 instead of $129 Samsung T9 SSD 4TB : $299 instead of $549 Bose TV Speaker : $199 instead of $279 PS5 Slim : $449 instead of $499 LG OLED evo C4 Series 55″ 4K : $1296 instead of $1999 Samsung : up to 80% off on the official site Bitdefender Antivirus : $19.99/year instead of $49.99 See all deals at Amazon Prime Day has been extended Amazon’s strategic decision to extend many of its deals beyond Prime members has broadened the event’s reach and allowed millions of shoppers worldwide to partake in the savings event. From cutting-edge electronics to everyday essentials, the breadth of discounted products continues to impress, even in the aftermath of the main event. Apple enthusiasts still have reason to celebrate as substantial price cuts persist on the tech giant’s products. The AirPods Pro 2, a favorite among audio aficionados, remains available at an enticing $189 this Thursday morning, down from their usual $249 price tag. Other Apple devices haven’t been left behind, with significant discounts continuing on iPads (still 40% off the original price), AirTags, and the AirPods Max. See all deals at Amazon Amazon’s own product line unsurprisingly maintains its position at the forefront of the discounts. Smart home devices like Echo speakers, Fire TV Sticks and Blink and Ring security cameras are still seeing price reductions ranging from 40% to a massive 70% off their original prices, one day after Prime Day. In a move that’s caught many by surprise, Amazon is also continuing to clear out stock of the Google Nest Wifi router and offers it at a mere $38 down from its original $169 price tag. The deals extend far beyond just electronics, including this Thursday. Shoppers can still find significant savings across major categories including televisions, with offers on Fire TVs, LG, TCL, and Sony models. Headphones, home appliances, gaming devices, beauty products, health products, and toys all continue to be part of the post-Prime Day festivities. Amazon, Samsung, etc. It’s not just Amazon that’s participating in this extended shopping event. Other retailers have launched their own competing offers on their platforms. Samsung, for instance, is offering great discounts on its latest technology through its official store with special deals and trade-in offers on the new Galaxy S24 smartphones and both Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 foldable models. As we enter this post-Prime Day period, it’s crucial for bargain hunters to act swiftly. Many of the best deals introduced at the start of the event are still available but popular items are likely to sell out very fast (and some might expire this morning). Even Amazon’s inventory management systems can be stretched to their limits during such high-demand periods. For those who have been considering a Prime membership, now might still be the perfect time to take the plunge. While many deals are accessible to all, Prime members continue to enjoy additional perks such as free and fast shipping, access to Prime Video, Amazon Music, and exclusive deals throughout the year. The sheer variety of deals across categories and brands and the opportunity for all shoppers to participate makes this an unmissable occasion for anyone looking to make significant savings, even after the Prime Day on Amazon. Whether you’re in the market for the latest tech gadgets, home appliances, fashion items, or everyday essentials, now is the time to take advantage of these substantial discounts that have lingered beyond the official Prime Day event. As these post-Prime Day offers continue to dwindle, it’s advisable to act quickly on any deals that catch your eye. Remember, these extended discounts won’t last forever, and it may be a long wait until the next major shopping event rolls around. Don’t miss out on the chance to snag that item you’ve been eyeing at a fraction of its usual cost. See all deals at Amazon
html:
As the dust settles on Amazon’s Prime Day event, you’ll see that the deals aren’t over just yet. While the official event has concluded, a lot of discounts remains for those quick enough to seize them. This year’s October Prime Day, also known as Prime Big Deal Days, proved to be a shopping phenomenon that rivaled the famous Black Friday in terms of savings. Check out the 20 must-see deals of the day that you won’t want to miss below!

See all deals at Amazon

Our Top 20 deals:

  • Google Nest Wifi : $38 instead of $169
  • iPad 9 64GB Wifi : $199 instead of $329
  • NordVPN : $3.09/month + 3 months for free (-73%)
  • WD 20TB external HD : $296 instead of $505
  • 4-pack AirTags : 79$ instead of $99
  • AirPods Pro 2 : $189 instead of $249
  • Beats Solo 4 : $99 instead of $199
  • Pixel 7 Pro 256GB : $447 instead of $999
  • Lego Star Wars Advent Calendar : $35 instead of $45
  • Arzopa 15″ portable monitor : $85 instead of $129
  • Samsung T9 SSD 4TB : $299 instead of $549
  • Bose TV Speaker : $199 instead of $279
  • PS5 Slim : $449 instead of $499
  • LG OLED evo C4 Series 55″ 4K : $1296 instead of $1999
  • Samsung : up to 80% off on the official site
  • Bitdefender Antivirus : $19.99/year instead of $49.99

See all deals at Amazon

Prime Day has been extended

Amazon’s strategic decision to extend many of its deals beyond Prime members has broadened the event’s reach and allowed millions of shoppers worldwide to partake in the savings event. From cutting-edge electronics to everyday essentials, the breadth of discounted products continues to impress, even in the aftermath of the main event.

Apple enthusiasts still have reason to celebrate as substantial price cuts persist on the tech giant’s products. The AirPods Pro 2, a favorite among audio aficionados, remains available at an enticing $189 this Thursday morning, down from their usual $249 price tag. Other Apple devices haven’t been left behind, with significant discounts continuing on iPads (still 40% off the original price), AirTags, and the AirPods Max.

See all deals at Amazon

Amazon’s own product line unsurprisingly maintains its position at the forefront of the discounts. Smart home devices like Echo speakers, Fire TV Sticks and Blink and Ring security cameras are still seeing price reductions ranging from 40% to a massive 70% off their original prices, one day after Prime Day. In a move that’s caught many by surprise, Amazon is also continuing to clear out stock of the Google Nest Wifi router and offers it at a mere $38 down from its original $169 price tag.

The deals extend far beyond just electronics, including this Thursday. Shoppers can still find significant savings across major categories including televisions, with offers on Fire TVs, LG, TCL, and Sony models. Headphones, home appliances, gaming devices, beauty products, health products, and toys all continue to be part of the post-Prime Day festivities.

Amazon, Samsung, etc.

It’s not just Amazon that’s participating in this extended shopping event. Other retailers have launched their own competing offers on their platforms. Samsung, for instance, is offering great discounts on its latest technology through its official store with special deals and trade-in offers on the new Galaxy S24 smartphones and both Z Fold 6 and Z Flip 6 foldable models.

As we enter this post-Prime Day period, it’s crucial for bargain hunters to act swiftly. Many of the best deals introduced at the start of the event are still available but popular items are likely to sell out very fast (and some might expire this morning). Even Amazon’s inventory management systems can be stretched to their limits during such high-demand periods.

For those who have been considering a Prime membership, now might still be the perfect time to take the plunge. While many deals are accessible to all, Prime members continue to enjoy additional perks such as free and fast shipping, access to Prime Video, Amazon Music, and exclusive deals throughout the year.

The sheer variety of deals across categories and brands and the opportunity for all shoppers to participate makes this an unmissable occasion for anyone looking to make significant savings, even after the Prime Day on Amazon. Whether you’re in the market for the latest tech gadgets, home appliances, fashion items, or everyday essentials, now is the time to take advantage of these substantial discounts that have lingered beyond the official Prime Day event.

As these post-Prime Day offers continue to dwindle, it’s advisable to act quickly on any deals that catch your eye. Remember, these extended discounts won’t last forever, and it may be a long wait until the next major shopping event rolls around. Don’t miss out on the chance to snag that item you’ve been eyeing at a fraction of its usual cost.

See all deals at Amazon
